name: Inline Policy
goal: Inline Policy is the specialist public affairs agency for politics and regulation of the tech sector. We help innovative businesses navigate through regulation and influence the development of new policies and regulations.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Banking and financial services, Budget, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Culture and media, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Foreign affairs and security policy, Fraud prevention, Institutional affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Sport, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
